pr_title: feat: add a DefaultSchemaRegistryClient and remove default for SR url in KsqlConfig

timeline.bodyText: Maybe make this more informative? "KSQL is not configured to use a schema registry. To enable it, please set ksql.schema.registry.url"
timeline.author: rodesai

timeline.bodyText: Trim the value before comparing it. If the value is "   ", then this check will think there is a URL specified. I recommend trimming the value once in the constructor when assigning the string to the schemaRegistryUrl so we don't have to trim it every time we use it.
timeline.author: spena
